Data: Cummins to Raina, 1 run dabbed to third man as he waits for a short delivery to arrive outside off
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs uses the bowler's pace and his shortish length as he swivels on the back foot and pulls to the fine leg boundary
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run keeps back and runs a short ball outside off to third man
Cummins to Raina, no run gets across outside off to a shortish delivery and defends
Cummins to Raina, no run 145kph, too full to be camping back and he is beaten for pace as well! Looks to steer the ball to third man and comes up with a whole lot of air
Cummins to Raina, 1 run jumps across outside off and clips a good length ball behind square leg
Watson to Raina, FOUR runs full on leg stump, Raina decides it just has to go and plays a fluent whip through midwicket. That was emphatic
Watson to Raina, no run turned away through midwicket
Watson to Raina, 2 runs gets across and clips a good length ball to deep square leg
Watson to Raina, 1 run gets across outside off and pulls the short ball on middle to long leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run opens the face against a back of a length delivery and finds point
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run gets forward to a good length ball and drives on the up to deep cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, dabbed in front of point as Rohit sets off. Denied
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run shortish on middle and off, blocked
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run tries to beat gully with the open face against a back of a length delivery outside off, but Smith dives to his left and denies him again
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs so what does Rohit do? He flies down the pitch like a truck in a high speed chase and hammers a length ball handsomely over long-on to bring up his fifty. Emphatic
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs full and outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket. Risky, but this pitch is not offering any more sideways movement

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off. The throw came in considering Rohit was out of his crease, the ball went through Rohit's legs and Haddin missed it. Was there a deflection? Single stolen
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller delivery on off stump, defended carefully
Watson to Raina, no run gets across and whips it square on the leg side
Watson to Raina, no run banged in short and Raina decides it's gained too much height for him to pull. Leaves it well alone
Watson to Raina, 1 wide good length ball wandering down the leg side, Raina's flick can't reach it
Watson to Raina, 1 run jumps back and pulls to deep square leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run good length ball on off stump, defended with soft hands towards point
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run spliced it, goes uppishly but it lands where there is no one posted - around short third man. Back of a length delivery on off stump misbehaves to have Rohit in trouble
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tucked in front of square leg to get off strike
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run gets across outside off to turn a good length ball through square leg
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run good length ball outside off seemed destined to end up a third man, but it doens't bounce as much and Rohit bunts it towards Haddin

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run think he picked the back of the hand slower ball and went down for a lap sweep, only problem is that kind of delivery bounces on a true pitch. Rohit is struck on the bicep
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run another slower ball on off stump, whipped to long-on
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run runs a shortish delivery with a little room outside off to deep third man
Sandhu to Raina, no run gets down the track, but Sandhu's extra bounce foils Raina's intent. Has to stick to defending a shortish ball
Sandhu to Raina, no run opens the face and runs a back of a length delivery to point
Sandhu to Raina, no run keeps back to block a shortish delivery on and around off stump
Sandhu to Raina, 1 run offcutter from Sandhu and he keeps getting extra bounce. Raina uses soft hands to dab it into the leg side and grab a single

Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run appeal. loud and concerted from Sandhu. Then there's a shy at the stumps as well. That certainly would have been out. Struck on the back pad and he was buckling over, impact seemed ot be on off stump but Sandhu's natural bounce goes against him this time. And there was some bat too. Steven Smith wasn't worried about the appeal though, he saw Rohit sluggish to
Sandhu to Raina, no run jumps inside the line and tucks a good length ball through square leg
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run flighted on leg stump, nudged to short midwicket
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs eases down the pitch and lifts the good length ball over extra cover. Took it off middle stump and he'd made his own room
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run stays back to a good length delivery and runs it towards point
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run
Maxwell to Raina, no run down the track and drives towards mid-on
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and a bit outside off, Rohit exploits it as he ramps it to deep third man
Sandhu to Raina, 1 run gets back into his crease to nudge a shortish delivery in front of square leg
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run offcutter on middle and leg, and the good length ball comes up towards Rohit's hips. Turned towards midwicket
Sandhu to Raina, 1 run he's been getting a lot of his runs in that square leg region, shuffling across and using the shortish length to his advantage.
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 3 runs short ball on leg stump, Rohit has swivelled and pulled towards the long leg boundary. It's a big one down there, and India take three
Sandhu to Raina, FOUR runs banged in short and Raina was swift to get outside the line and pull to the fine leg boundary
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run flighted on off stump, Rohit lunges forward to block
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 3 runs gets back to a flatter delivery and threads it through the covers. Can't take on a fast bowler's arm, It was Cummins
Maxwell to Raina, 2 runs lurches down the track, but can't quite reach the pitch. Slugs it away wide of mid-on for a single

Maxwell to Raina, FOUR runs another attempt at reaching the pitch, but Maxwell's controlled his flight quite well again. Made Raina reach outside off and secures an outside edge. But it travels to the third man boundary
Maxwell to Raina, no run shimmies down and pushes at a length ball to mid-off
Maxwell to Raina, no run goes back to a flatter delivery and turns it to midwicket
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, Rohit looks for a flick and inside edges onto pad
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pushed down the ground to long-on
Sandhu to Raina, no run gets across on off stump to defend a back of a length delivery
Sandhu to Raina, FOUR runs good shot from Raina again as he picks the gap at fine leg. Strays in line does Sandhu with his shortish delivery and it's been pulled with lovely control

Sandhu to Raina, no run runs down the track while trying to make room for himself. Sandhu cramps him for room with an offcutter. Pushed towards the covers. No single there and Raina has to employ a full-length dive to save himself from Maxi's direct hit
Sandhu to Raina, no run another slower ball on middle and off, defended
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slid off the open face as Faulkner bowls short and works the angle across the right-hander
Faulkner to Raina, no run good length ball on middle and off, Raina taps it towards mid-on and sets off. Maxwell does not allow the single and sends Raina scampering back again
Faulkner to Raina, no run turned into the leg side as he gets back and across to a good length ball outside off
Faulkner to Raina, 1 wide lands a leg-stump slower ball to which Raina attempts a sweep. But since the ball slides down, the umpire has called wide
Faulkner to Raina, (no ball) 1 run back of the hand slower ball goes awry as it ends up a beamer outside off and Raina leaps up off his feet to lash it to deep third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, defended
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run fullish on middle and leg, kept out
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs gets inside the line and pulls a shortish delivery to deep square leg. Rohit wants two and gets it off a weakish throw from Sandhu. Looks like it's drinks
Sandhu to Raina, no run back of a length on off stump, Raina decides to stay inside the line this time and blocks
Sandhu to Raina, 1 run strays on the pads and it's been clipped to long leg quite easily
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on off stump, Rohit pushes past the bowler before he could get down to it
Sandhu to Raina, 1 run slower ball, but its on leg stump. Clipped through midwicket
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, no run offcutter a bit outside off, defended with an open face
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs banged in and Rohit's been very good on the pull today. Besides, Sandhu forgot to wave his magic wand and get this ball to bounce high enough.
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run goes back to block a shortish delivery and picks a single into the covers
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish on leg stump, tucked away off the hips to long leg
Faulkner to Raina, no run nails the back of the hand slower ball as he beats the flashing Raina blade outside off
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run this time the batsman spots the variation, waits for it and runs the shortish delivery down to deep third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs a bit of bounce on the back-of-the-hand slower ball. Rohit attempts a flick and ends up with an inside edge that floats over the leg stump. Into the nineties
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs boundary to third man this time and Rohit controls it far better. Sees the room attached to the slower ball and dabs an open face on it
Watson to Raina, no run good length ball on off stump, defended stoutly
Watson to Raina, 1 wide change of pace slides down leg with Raina moving across to off stump. Wide called
Watson to Raina, no run opens the face and runs the ball to point
Watson to Raina, 1 run gets across and clips to deep square leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run waits on a shortish delivery on the fourth stump and runs it towards short third man. No single there

Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run flicks a good length ball on middle, no single there either with short midwicket racing in. Throw comes in at the non-strikers' and it was wide enough that Raina doesn't even bother grounding his bat
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish on leg stump, nudged towards fine leg
Starc to Raina, 1 run full and outside off, Raina clips it through midwicket to secure a fifty. A much-needed one in terms of where India were when he came in
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller delivery outside off, slid off the front foot to deep third man
Starc to Raina, 1 run full and outside off, Raina plants the open face down on it to get a single behind point
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run rides the bounce on this short delivery outside off to beat a diving point

Starc to Raina, OUT he's thrown it away! It was a fuller delivery outside off and Raina got on the front foot and hacked it straight at mid-on. And you know what happens when Australia get an opening...
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run shortish on off stump, Rohit dabs towards point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run angled into the pads off a fuller length and Rohit clips to long leg. Moves to 99, one more run to become the second Indian to make a century at the MCG
Cummins to Dhoni, no run attempts a yorker first up, but can't quite land it. Dhoni protects his off stump
Cummins to Dhoni, no run good length ball, with a hint of shape back in at Dhoni. Defended
Cummins to Dhoni, FOUR runs that's a missile! Target set on the point boundary the minute Cummins bowled short and wide. India's commander yells fire one!
Cummins to Dhoni, no run fuller delivery on off stump, defended towards the covers

Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller delivery, angled across him. Outside edge to secure the run he wants to cross over to a hundred! The first by an Indian at the MCG since Jan 2000, and only the second in history. Raises his bat to the crowd and gets a pat on the back from his captain. He's weathered the new ball, got over his strike rate issues and has controlled the innings quite well
Starc to Dhoni, no run back of a length and outside off, not bothered with
Starc to Dhoni, no run a bit fuller as Starc tests Dhoni outside off, happy to leave this alone as well
Starc to Dhoni, no run good length ball outside off, Dhoni gets across and lifts his bat over his head
Starc to Dhoni, no run good length ball outside off, Dhoni lets Haddin worry about it
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run full and wide, Dhoni slashes to deep third man with an open face
Cummins to Dhoni, no run good pace and better direction on this good length ball on middle, tucked to mid-on
Cummins to Dhoni, no run rises up with a shortish ball outside off and slaps it to point
Cummins to Dhoni, no run offcutter on off stump, Dhoni is back with a punch to mid-off
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run shortish on off stump, Dhoni jumps back and across and flicks through to midwicket
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run gets up on his toes to turn a shortish delivery on off stump towards square leg
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run punches a shortish delivery into the covers and races across to the other end
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs punishes Faulkner for straying in line with the slower ball. Clipped off the thigh pad to the fine leg boundary, off the gloves though
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run back to normal pace with the fuller ball on off stump, defended
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run full on off stump, drilled to mid-off
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run fuller delivery on off stump, Dhoni gets behind it
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run good length ball on off stump, defended
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run goes back in his crease to turn the shortish delivery at 140 kph to deep backward square leg
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run goes for a clip off a good length ball on off stump, says wait as midwicket attempts to stop it, then jogs away after it passes him
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run 142kph, gets up on his toes against a short delivery on off stump, run down to point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs picks up the short ball and hammers it away! This was miles in front of midwicket! What a lusty blow, and he took it off the front foot as well.
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish and outside off, steered to deep third man. He's becoming too predictable with the length
Cummins to Dhoni, no run 139kph, seems to stick in the pitch a bit more and gain some extra bounce. Dhoni softens his grip and clips into the leg side
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back-of-the-hand slower ball pitched full on off stump, defended off the inside edge
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs leans into a square drive against a fuller delivery outside off for a couple of runs
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run wafts at a good length ball outside off and is beaten, hundred or not that little loose shot ends up surfacing for Rohit
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run good length ball on middle and off, picked away to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run slower ball on the legs, Dhoni nudges it to fine leg
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller delivery on off stump, eased through the covers
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run gets off his feet to negotiate the bounce of this shortish offcutter on off stump
Sandhu to Dhoni, 1 run slower ball goes short and Dhoni has cracked a pull to long leg
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 3 wide slants a good length ball a long way down leg, far enough that Haddin can't reach it with a dive to his left
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, no run gets across on off stump and works a good length ball to short fine leg. Good thing he got bat to that
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, no run backs away, but he is fooled by Sandhu's offcutter. Tries to hack it through midwicket and gets an inside edge
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run stays a bit low does this short, slower ball and Rohit pulls to long leg
Sandhu to Dhoni, 2 runs yawning open spaces on the on side and Dhoni exploits them with a deft flick. Deep midwicket has lots of ground to cover, before which the Indians have taken a couple
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide full and wide, called as much by the umpire
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs full and slid across the right-hander, but an open face from Rohit has the ball scurrying to the third man boundary. Nicely placed
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run settles on off stump and drives a fuller delivery into the covers
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run lands a yorker on off stump, which Rohit jabs into the covers for a single
Starc to Dhoni, no run 142kph, spears in a fuller delivery on middle and leg. A bit of curl away from the batsman, to take the leading edge while he was attempting a flick
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run sliced into the covers as he camps back, knowing it will be quite full and moving across him
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run finds deep third man this time as Starc searches for the wide yorker
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs cramps him for room with a slower length ball, but there is no one inside the circle to prevent the mis-hit flick from amounting to a couple of runs
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish and on off stump, so Rohit makes his own room and belts it to point. Good work there as he gets a hand on it and keeps it to a single
Sandhu to Dhoni, 1 run shortish on leg stump, goes for a pull but doesn't quite connect well. Hit high on the bat for a single to long leg

Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs slower ball, picked and clattered to the wide long-on boundary! Good, long stride and a clean swing of the arms against the fuller ball. Poor from Sandhu for affording the room to swing the arms
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish on off stump, pulled off the front foot to long leg
Sandhu to Dhoni, 1 run lots of slower balls being employed of varying lengths, this one is shorter and Dhoni pulls to long leg as well
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run starts off with the slower ball on off stump, Ashwin tries to exploit the huge gap in front of square on the leg side but fails. Sends the flick back at the bowler
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run waits on the shortish ball and slides it down to third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run 107kph, runs at Faulkner and slogs wildly, but the change of pace fools him. Off side is where the fielders are up and he goes cow corner. Misses
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish and cramping him on middle and leg, Rohit dabs it through point
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run goes for the paddle-pull and finds short fine leg
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs length, that's what Rohit wants in this stage and he stays still, gets his balance right as he clears the front leg and lashes it over the long-on boundary
Cummins to Ashwin, no run slower short ball slips beneath Ashwin's pull
Cummins to Ashwin, 1 run 139kph, lovely stroke from Ashwin as he lines up a shortish ball angled in on off stump and cuts it quite late to third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run steps forward to a Cummins short ball and flat batted to long-on
Cummins to Ashwin, 1 leg bye gets across on off stump to try and pick the length ball off his toes. Appeal from Cummins for leg before but that would have gone down leg
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower short ball, Rohit spotted it and belts it to midwicket for a single
Cummins to Ashwin, 1 run lashed over the covers as he makes room against the back of a length delivery on off stump. But there is a sweeper in place
Starc to Dhoni, no run flashing blade of Dhoni doesn't succeed when Starc cramps him up. Shortish delivery on fourth-fifth stump. Finds point

Starc to Dhoni, OUT his penultimate over of the match and he secures a huge strike for Australia. The offcutter has very little room but Dhoni wants to slice it. Gets a thick inside edge and it crashes into the stumps
Starc to Axar Patel, no run cuts him in half with a full, fast inswinger. Akshar wants the booming cover drive, has to settle for his off stump being intact

Starc to Axar Patel, OUT there goes another domino! Spearing yorker strikes the back leg with Akshar playing all around it. Would that have missed leg? Beaten for pace, beaten for movement and India are slipping
Starc to Ashwin, no run lovely length from Starc, keeps it right up there on off stump and Ashwin is capably behind it
Starc to Ashwin, no run ends his spell with a double-wicket maiden! Oops, he still has an over left. Brilliant yorker on off stump and Ashwin does well to get his bat down
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish on middle and off, turned through midwicket
Sandhu to Ashwin, 2 runs short delivery, pulled to long leg
Sandhu to Ashwin, 1 run shortish on middle and off, picked away to deep square leg
Sandhu to Rohit Sharma, 1 run sliced through to the sweeper
Sandhu to Ashwin, no run lands it full on off stump, Ashwin digs it out
Sandhu to Ashwin, 1 run curls in late for Sandhu and Ashwin manages an inside edge to long leg. Ends a good first showing in ODIs

Starc to Ashwin, 2 runs is that his fifth? No, his new-ball partner Cummins drops it! Full and a shade wide, Ashwin did his bit by clearing the front leg and swinging for the cover fend. But gets a leading edge and the sweeper running in can't grab hold
Starc to Ashwin, 2 runs full delivery angled across Rohit, but he goes for a flick and gets a leading edge to deep third man
Starc to Ashwin, 1 leg bye wanders away outside off to try a scoop, but Starc bowls it too full for Ashwin to get under. Has to settle for a leg bye

Starc to Rohit Sharma, OUT caught on the edge of the circle, that is Starc's fifth and it comes off his worst ball of the day - a full toss. Rohit was looking for quick runs, but his cow-corner club comes low off the inside half of the bat and picks out midwicket

Starc to Bhuvneshwar, OUT cleaned him up! that's six! Changed the angle of delivery and came around the wicket to Bhuvi, the new batsman. It was full, it was speared in on middle. The batsman stayed beside the ball to open up the off side, but fails to connect with his shovel drive. Starc smile might as well translate as 'you miss, I hit'
Starc to Shami, no run good yorker on off stump and Shami does well to prevent three in three
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run starts off with the slower ball outside off. dabbed to short third man. Not quite enough pace for Ashwin to exploit
Faulkner to Shami, 1 run tucked through midwicket to return strike to the better batsman. Well done, Shami. Bat on ball.
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run the back of the hand slower ball is short on middle, Ashwin pulls off the front foot and misses. Gripped in the pitch and bounced a bit more
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run moves leg side, Faulkner follows him with a back of a length delivery which has been slogged to deep square leg
Faulkner to Shami, 1 run length on off stump, Shami looks for the stands beyond long-on but mistimes it. Single to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 bye and they secure a bye off the last ball. Only five runs off it, as Ashwin ran away outside off to scoop the fuller ball and misses

6.17 pm We've strayed a bit into the lunch break with Australia's over-rate slipping below what it should be. A few wides didn't help either. But aside from that they've done quite well against a batting line-up that loves ODIs, with the other Mitch staking his claim to be the main Mitch. But as well as Starc bowled for his 6 for 43, India haven't done too badly either. They recovered from a few

6.45pm A short break there because of the slow over rate, Australia took an extra 26 minutes to bowl their 50 overs. Finch will take strike now, Bhuvneshwar has the first new ball with two slips. Here we go...
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run swings it in a little bit on length outside off, left alone
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run wider outside off and coming in again, Finch chops it to point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run shorter and wider outside off now, cut straight to point again
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 wide mixes it up with an outswinger this time, but it's well outside off for a wide
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run length delivery swinging away a bit, pushed with a thickish edge down to third man for one
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run back of length from leg towards middle, good bounce makes Warner go back and hop to defend it to leg
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 3 runs fullish outside off now, pushed through the covers off the front foot in the gap, Kohli chases and slides to pull it in
Yadav to Warner, 2 runs back of length on the legs, clipped off the pads after a hop on the back foot to deep square leg for two
Yadav to Warner, no run back of length towards middle this time, tucked to midwicket and the fielder gets a direct hit at non-striker's. No overthrows

Yadav to Warner, 1 run 144kph, induces the outside edge but it flies well past second slip to third man for one. Was slightly back of length outside off and it moved away as Warner defended off the back foot
Yadav to Finch, FOUR runs flashes at it and gets four over the slips! It was pretty wide and short, Finch didn't time it very well but got enough to send it over slip
Yadav to Finch, 1 wide this one's pretty wide too and swings away further outside off for a wide
Yadav to Finch, FOUR runs crunching drive, that looked glorious! Full outside off with the away movement and Finch got on top of it with an authoritative cover drive for four
Yadav to Finch, 1 leg bye drifts towards the pads now from back of of length, deflects it down behind square for a leg bye
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run gets back and across against a shortish delivery, contact was a bit high on the bat as he cuts
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run mild appeal from Bhuvi as he corrects his length and line on middle. Might have been sliding down
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs picked away through to long leg

Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run leaps to his left at cover and lifts himself onto his knees soon after to prevent Finch from going for a single. Deserved some runs considering the timing on that back-foot cover drive
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run clipped through midwicket as he gets in line with a length ball on middle
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run good length ball a shade outside off, gets some seam away as well, gets Finch's respect as well as he leaves

Shami to Warner, FOUR runs oh dear, that's a terrible delivery to start off with. And Warner gleefully sends it away to the fine leg boundary. Short, way down leg and all the batsman had to do was help it away
Shami to Warner, 1 wide 143 kph, short and sliding down leg again. This time Warner is happy to collect the wide
Shami to Warner, no run much better, he needs to stick in that off-stump region. Back of a length delivery also keeps Warner honest

Shami to Warner, FOUR runs one-legged pull to the square leg boundary, but this was the bowler's mistake again. Bowling short with the new ball, bowling on leg stump with the new ball. No pressure on Australia now
Shami to Warner, no run pendulums back to off stump and Warner pushes to mid-off
Shami to Warner, no run 145kph, shortish on and around off stump, defended
Shami to Warner, no run keeps to the crease and hits through the line of a back of a length delivery and finds mid-off

Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs back of a length, yet Finch is confidently forward and taps to mid-off, who is under pressure as Finch sets off. Direct hit would have caught him short at the non-strikers', with Finch not diving. Ends up with an overthrow
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run tight line on off stump, Finch can only block down the pitch
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run back of a length on off stump, defended carefully
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run shortish and outside off, Finch goes for the cut but seems to check it at the last minute
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run back of a length on off stump, Finch gets behind it
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run down the track to try and mess up Bhuvi's lovely lengths, ends up with an inside edge for his trouble and he retains strike as it goes towards square leg
Shami to Finch, no run brings Finch forward to protect his off stump. He should bowl better at the right-hander
Shami to Finch, no run attempts a forcing drive off a good length ball on off stump, gets it off the inside of the bat and Shami gets a hand on it while following through
Shami to Finch, 1 run seems to get a bit of a bottom edge to a good length ball only a shade outside off. Single to deep third man
Shami to Warner, 1 run takes on the short ball, with the field set for it! Nearly carries all the way to Akshar at deep square leg.
Shami to Finch, no run 139 kph, has Finch in a spot of bother as he pings a shortish delivery down on off stump. Squares him up as the batsman uses an open face to run down to point

Shami to Finch, no run good length on off stump, Finch defends to mid-off and Shami walks back with a far better over under his belt. Had his pace up, had his radar right, just needs to reproduce it over and over and over
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run firmly behind a back of a length delivery on off stump
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run opens the face against a shortish ball and slices it to deep point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run stands up tall and punches to the left of mid-off. Lovely straight bat coming down on the back of a length delivery

Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run oof, did the ball clip off stump?! Or did it take the bottom of the bat? Definitely hit the bottom of the bat and it veers back towards the stumps, but misses it by a whisker!

Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run Rohit has a direct hit, but Warner is well home after a push towards mid-off. Decent throw off that angle, but despite being on the back foot Warner was immensely quick off the blocks
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run gets back and across and tucks the shortish delivery away towards midwicket
Shami to Finch, FOUR runs width offered and Finch accepts the present as he flays the fuller ball over mid-off. Powerful stroke
Shami to Finch, no run decides to go along the ground this time as he drives a good length ball into the covers
Shami to Finch, 1 run seems to be right in line of the stumps, but he is able to flick the good length ball off his legs to deep midwicket
Shami to Warner, FOUR runs despairing dive from Kohli at deep square leg, but Warner's pull has too much heat on it. Shami errs by bowling short and a bit too straight
Shami to Warner, no run stands and delivers a whip, which mid-on does well to stop, diving away to his right
Shami to Warner, 2 runs goes full on the pads this time and Warner works it to deep midwicket and takes on Virat Kohli's throw. Big dive, easily home
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run fuller delivery on middle and leg, Finch defends towards mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run keeps to the crease and pushes a good length ball into the covers
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run gets the bottom of the bat again! We should really get on a name for that ball from Bhuvi. Finch was stepping forward to block, but the ball wanders behind him to slip
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run great work from short point, Suresh Raina moves to his right and stops a cracking cut shot. The deflection though is potential for a single and Warner capitalises
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, no run shortish, but not quite wide enough. Warner slaps it to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Warner, 1 run picked away off his hips to long leg. Has the leg-side short-ball bug caught Bhuvi too?

Yadav to Warner, OUT skies it! Raina calls for it immediately and yells in delight after completing a soft dismissal. It was short of a good length, but Warner's front foot press works against him. Then he decided to play a sort of a pull shot when there wasn't much room. Ends up spooning a simple catch at extra cover, which was well taken.
Yadav to Finch, 1 run full and slipping down leg, Finch helps it away to long leg
Yadav to Watson, no run starts well against the new man, probing just a shade outside off with that in-between length. But to Watson and his famous front-foot press, that doesn't matter. Leaves it
Yadav to Watson, no run gets forward and blocks a back of a length delivery to cover
Yadav to Watson, no run pushes him back with a short ball on off stump, defended
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run good length ball on fifth stump, Finch is caught in the crease as he pushes to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run gets forward to the fuller ball outside off and taps to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run solid stride forward to defend a fuller delivery to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run loosens the grip on his bat, runs a back of a length delivery to third man and secures a single
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run just short of a good length on middle, Watson picks short midwicket with a flick
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run reaches forward to drive a fuller ball outside off on the up, mistimes it to mid-off. Good control of length from Bhuvi
Yadav to Finch, no run shortish delivery on off stump, Finch blocks
Yadav to Finch, no run offcutter just a bit outside off, defended into the covers
Yadav to Finch, no run back of a length on fifth stump, Finch brings down a straight bat
Yadav to Finch, no run forces a good length ball to cover point. India are stringing together a good stretch of dots now

Yadav to Finch, no run beaten off a beautiful delivery, and the pressure that's been built. Attempts something extravagant off a back of a length delivery outside off as he steps forward ti drive on the up
Yadav to Finch, no run 141kph, gets the ball to straighten and beat Finch all ends up! Finishes with a maiden as India concede only eight runs in the last four overs, and the wicket of Warner
Axar Patel to Watson, FOUR runs drags the length short and Watson camps back in his crease and cuts behind point. Not the best start from yet another Indian bowler
Axar Patel to Watson, no run that's quicker and it skids into Watson way too quick for the pull. Mistimes into the leg side
Axar Patel to Watson, no run tossed up on middle and leg, tucked to short midwicket
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run a bit short again and Watson has sliced it to the sweeper
Axar Patel to Finch, no run fuller delivery on middle and leg, Finch drives back at the bowler
Axar Patel to Finch, no run fired in on middle, Finch keeps it out
Yadav to Watson, no run wafts outside off and is beaten by a back of a length delivery outside off. Good channels from Umesh
Yadav to Watson, FOUR runs full, but it has width. The search for swing backfires on Umesh as Watson drives on the up and lifts it over extra cover
Yadav to Watson, 1 run a bit of extra bounce for Umesh as he hits back of a length and outside off, Watson dabs it to third man
Yadav to Finch, 1 run shortish on middle and leg, the batsman hops up off his feet to find mid-on
Yadav to Watson, FOUR runs short and wide, Watson slaps it high over point and wide of third man. Well placed, easy boundary
Yadav to Watson, no run corrects his line and length and keeps Watson to a dot as he seeks the top of off stump
Axar Patel to Finch, no run nudged to the left of short midiwcket as Akshar does what he does - cramp the batsman for room with his darts

Axar Patel to Finch, no run huge appeal from Akshar as Finch attempts something different. Gets a decent stride forward to sweep a fuller ball on off stump. Just a hint of turn, and perhaps the umpire thinks it would miss the target. Kohli is gutted, even comes up to ask the ump for a clarification. The impact might have been outside off
Axar Patel to Finch, FOUR runs pressure release as the ball is a bit short and Shami is not the best man at point, can't get across to his left fast enough
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run tapped away towards short midwicket
Axar Patel to Watson, no run tossed up on off stump, driven to mid-off
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run pushed to mid-off to end the over
Yadav to Watson, no run 141kph, short and wide, but his zip and extra bounce saves him from a Watson cut
Yadav to Watson, no run back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers where Kohli is very alert
Yadav to Watson, FOUR runs not this time. Watson gets his second chance at a short and wide delight and he beats point comfortably
Yadav to Watson, 2 runs back of a length on middle, Watson clips it to long leg and secures an easy two
Yadav to Watson, 1 run fuller delivery on off stump, tapped to the right of mid-on
Yadav to Finch, no run stands up tall behind the back of a length delivery and punches it down to mid-off
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run driven to long-off as he stays inside the line of a tossed up delivery outside off
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run moves back and slices a flatter delivery off the stumps to deep point
Axar Patel to Watson, no run fast and full on off stump and Watson, having gone back, defends just in time
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run gets down the track to drive the fuller delivery to long-on
Axar Patel to Finch, no run fired in on leg stump, too quick for Finch and his straight drive

Axar Patel to Finch, no run rapped on the pads again, but his angle into the batsman might be working against him on this shout. Across-the-line whip from Finch but he survives to have a drink and clear his mind
Ashwin to Watson, 2 runs starts a bit too straight and he is picked away to long leg.
Ashwin to Watson, no run good length ball on off stump brings Watson forward to block
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run good length ball on middle, picked away to square leg
Ashwin to Finch, no run moves around the wicket to Finch and he defends the length ball on off stump
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run picks up the length ball this time and wallops it to deep square leg with a slog sweep
Ashwin to Watson, SIX runs fluent movement towards the pitch of the ball and Watson unleashes impressive power to slam the good length ball into the sightscreen. Pressure on Ashwin straight away
Axar Patel to Finch, no run back of a length on off stump, Finch gets up tall and punches to cover
Axar Patel to Finch, no run oof! skids off the deck and beats Finch's cut shot. Quite close to off stump as well
Axar Patel to Finch, no run pushed back at the bowler with a straight bat
Axar Patel to Finch, no run tries to make his own room by moving leg side of the ball, but can't pierce the cover field
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run this time Akshar provides a hint of width and it's been sliced through cover
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run backs away and punches the flatter delivery outside off through cover. That's Australia's hundred
Ashwin to Watson, no run good length ball on off stump, Watson defends carefully
Ashwin to Watson, no run a bit slower through the air and Watson has to check his flick. Mild leading edge, but it falls short of Ashwin's right
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run turned away through square leg as Ashwin bowls his usual, quickish pace on leg stump
Ashwin to Finch, no run a touch more bounce on leg stump and Finch works the ball, one-handed, to short fine leg
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run gets down the track and works the good length ball on leg stump to deep square leg
Ashwin to Watson, no run back over the wicket to Watson who pushes a shortish delivery outside off towards cover
Axar Patel to Finch, no run full on middle, Finch drives at mid-off
Axar Patel to Finch, 2 runs stays beside the ball and crunches the fuller delivery to long-off
Axar Patel to Finch, no run pushed to long-off from the back foot
Axar Patel to Finch, no run stays back to defend a flatter, quicker delivery on middle and leg
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run shortish and outside off, Finch cuts to the sweeper
Axar Patel to Watson, no run too full to cut and Watson is beaten outside off
Ashwin to Finch, no run cramps him up on leg stump and Finch's flick to a good length ball finds short midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run worked to short fine leg and Dhawan fumbles to allow an easy single
Ashwin to Watson, no run flighted on off stump, eased to midwicket
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run stays back against a good length ball and flicks it to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs jumps outside leg to loosen Ashwin's strangle and succeeds as he slaps the short ball through the covers.
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run down the track, but Ashwin limits his flight and keeps it to a single through a square-leg clip
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run driven solidly to long-off. Dhoni's kept a mid-off as well.
Axar Patel to Watson, 1 run opens the face and slices a good length ball from off stump into the covers
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run drilled to long-on as Akshar flights in on middle and leg
Axar Patel to Smith, no run good length ball on off stump, defended
Axar Patel to Smith, no run down the track with a whip to mid-on. No single there, SPD
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run nudged through midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Smith, no run slows it up on off stump, Smith reaches forward to defend
Ashwin to Smith, no run movevs back and across to clip a good length ball to square leg
Ashwin to Smith, no run opens the face against a good length ball that goes on with the arm. Adjusts late there

Ashwin to Smith, 1 run clipped off the pads and Smith wants to get off the mark. Might be a risky run here, and the umps are calling for a second look. Excellent work from Dhoni who deflects the incoming throw onto the stumps. Sort of like a late cut played just with his hands and no bat
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run clipped away to deep midwicket
Shami to Finch, 1 run fuller delivery outside off brings out the Finch cover drive. Handsome stroke, and he does appear far more solid against pace
Shami to Smith, 1 run uses the width on offer and sends the length ball wandering away to third man
Shami to Finch, no run fuller delivery on off stump, defended
Shami to Finch, 2 runs slower ball on middle and off, Finch whips it away through midwicket and picks up a couple that takes him to fifty
Shami to Finch, no run good length ball on off stump, defended
Shami to Finch, 2 runs right up there on off stump and Finch's bat skews in his hands as he drives wider of mid-on than he intended
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the track to clip a flatter delivery on leg stump to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run stays on the back foot and clips a shortish delivery to deep square leg
Ashwin to Smith, no run sees a hint of width outside off, but mistimes the flat-batted thump into the covers
Ashwin to Smith, no run works away a good length ball towards midwicket
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run short and outside leg stump, Smith deftly nudges it to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, no run reaches forward to a good length ball and taps it back at the bowler
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs sweetly struck! It wasn't such a bad ball, but Smith is in such good form that he stands and magic wands it back down the pitch. Sublime straight drive
Shami to Smith, no run good length a shade outside off, defended
Shami to Smith, no run 143kph, searing yorker on middle and off, Smith is able to dig it out
Shami to Smith, no run fullish on off stump, Smith though is just as happy blocking off the back foot
Shami to Smith, 2 runs strays on middle and leg and Smith's whirling wrists sends the ball packing to long leg
Shami to Smith, 1 run banged in, but Smith is quite good at dealing with those. Swivels on the back foot and pulls it to long leg as well
Ashwin to Smith, no run goes back and tucks it to short midwicket. Good work from the man diving to his right
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run waits a touch more and nudges the good length ball through to deep square leg
Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs back and across to work the flat delivery off leg stump to deep square leg and they trot through for a couple. This around-the-wicket ploy is no longer working to contain
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run tapped in front of square leg for a single
Ashwin to Smith, 1 leg bye beats him in flight, or lack of it, as Smith steps forward to flick a good length delivery through midwicket. Sneaks between bat and pad and to third man for a single
Ashwin to Finch, no run pushed into the covers
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run shortish on off stump, Smith tucks it in front of square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run gets forward to a back of a length delivery on off stump, tapped into the covers
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 wide slips down leg and Finch allows it to skirt past him and to the keeper
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run punched to long-off, after Rain lets a straight forward pick-up elude him. Didn't bend down enough. Rare that, a Raina misfield
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run gets across on off stump and picks a fuller delivery on middle to long leg
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run solid drive to long-off against a back of a length delivery outside off
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run easily done as he judges the line of a shortish delivery to be outside off and runs it to deep third man
Ashwin to Smith, no run down the track to push a flatter delivery straight of midiwcket
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs he bowls fast and flat, Smith does very little as he gives the ball some direction off the open face, beats short third man and tucks into clever boundary
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run goes back and taps a length delivery to long-on
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run pushed to long-off
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs cut away, and it didn't have all that much room. Just quick feet to get him back and excellent control with his hands to beat point
Ashwin to Smith, no run full on middle, pushed back at the bowler

Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs was there an edge? Dhoni had come up to the stumps and has to negotiate a bit of extra bounce. Finch didnt' do well against it, and Dhoni can't do much better either. Very difficult chance
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run worked away to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run opens the face on a short and wide delivery and secures a single to third man
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run back of a length and Finch does better against this one as he softens his grip and rides the bounce to point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run takes a length ball on off stump and dabs it to deep third man
Raina to Finch, 1 wide surprise, surprise, a slider down leg. Finch can't connect with the sweep, but will take the wide
Raina to Finch, SIX runs fuller delivery on off stump brings Finch forward with a slap over the long-on boundary. Got it more near the bottom of the bat, but he's got enough power, does Finch
Raina to Finch, no run backs away and slaps a flatter delivery to cover
Raina to Finch, no run good length ball on off stump, cramps Finch up even if he had tried to make his own room
Raina to Finch, 2 runs turned away through midwicket for a couple. The huge MCG outfield is finding India's fielders out
Raina to Finch, 1 run nudged through square leg
Raina to Smith, no run good length ball on off stump, drilled to short midwicket
Yadav to Finch, no run starts well here as he bowls a good length outside off and keeps Finch to a defensive push
Yadav to Finch, 2 runs shortish on middle, Finch tickles it behind square leg and races across for a couple of runs before Akshar at long leg can come up to the ball
Yadav to Finch, 1 run back of a length on off stump, Finch uses soft hands to tap the ball into the covers and grab a quick, well-judged single
Yadav to Smith, no run a touch slower and a shade outside off, defended
Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs full and sliding down, Smith gets inside the line and glances it to the long leg boundary. Effortless
Yadav to Smith, no run gets back and across to a shortish delivery on off stump and blocks
Raina to Finch, no run good length ball a bit outside off, Finch can only defend
Raina to Finch, 1 wide down the leg side and it misses Finch's shovel sweep. Wide though

Raina to Finch, SIX runs slog swept to the straight boundary! Again, it's not off the middle but it carries well over the boundary. Well, if the front line spinners didn't trouble Australia on this flat deck, what hope does Raina have
Raina to Finch, 1 run goes back to a good length ball and clips it through the leg side
Raina to Smith, 1 run gets up tall and punches a good length ball to long-off
Raina to Finch, 1 run

Raina to Smith, FOUR runs beautiful shot! Take a bow, Smith. But he won't he has a job to do. And only a little bit of it might involve manufacturing a boundary like that with the required rate only at 5. Makes room and slices a flat delivery from a shade outside off stump to the point boundary
Yadav to Finch, 1 run opens the face to a good length ball and finds a single to deep third man
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, defended
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs stays back against a fuller delivery outside off and lets it run off the open face to deep third man
Yadav to Smith, 1 run invites third man into the game with a glide as this too is short and wide outside off
Yadav to Finch, no run back of a length on off stump, defended
Yadav to Finch, 1 run full and slanted down leg, Finch isn't able to cash in. Gets an inside edge to long leg
Shami to Finch, 2 runs a bit short and wide outside off, Finch is forward and lobs it over point
Shami to Finch, no run fuller delivery on off stump, Finch is onto it a bit too quickly and gets an outside edge into the covers
Shami to Finch, 1 run leaps off his feet to negotiate a short ball on off stump, keeps it down towards square leg for a single
Shami to Smith, 1 run pushes an open face in line with a wide yorker and gets a single to third man
Shami to Finch, no run back of a length on off stump, slid to point
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run good length on off stump, punched to long-off
Axar Patel to Finch, no run slid into the pads and Finch wears it, having been too slow on the flick
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run tucked to the right of midwicket as Akshar darts in on middle and leg
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run pushed to long-on as the flat, length ball reaches him on leg stump
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 wide slips down leg, as he fears Finch running at him. Dhoni does well to take it
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run worked away to short fine leg for a single
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run flighted on off stump, driven smartly to long-on
Shami to Smith, no run wants the yorker, but gets the low full toss and has to prevent a Smith straight drive from getting past him
Shami to Smith, no run a shade short and outside off, Smith rides it to point. The required rate is under five now...
Shami to Smith, 1 run opens the face to beat point comfortably this time as Shami bowls short and wide. That's his 1000th ODI run
Shami to Finch, 1 run slower ball, picked up by Finch as he drives to mid-off and sets off for a quick single. Makes it despite the throw
Shami to Smith, no run full and outside off, stroked to mid-off
Shami to Smith, no run shortish on middle and off, nudged to short midwicket
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run fired in on middle and leg, driven to long-on
Axar Patel to Smith, FOUR runs only the smallest bit of room, but Smith has planted his front leg down, opened the face and drills the ball through point
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run pushed past mid-off
Axar Patel to Finch, no run a touch slower on off stump, defended
Axar Patel to Finch, 1 run whipped past short midwicket and he takes on the mid-on, who is right on the edge of the circle. India are doing nothing to stop Australia here.
Axar Patel to Smith, no run down the track and whipped to short midwicket
Shami to Finch, no run banged in short and Finch goes for a pull after pushing his balance back, too high for him
Shami to Finch, 1 run seeks the blockhole on and around off stump, jammed into the covers
Shami to Smith, no run offcutter at the base of off stump, Smith nails a straight drive and the stumps and forces Finch to jump back into the crease
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run rides the short ball down to deep third man
Shami to Finch, 1 run gets back to a shortish delivery on off stump and tucks it through midwicket
Yadav to Finch, 1 wide jogs in and bowls the customary slip down the leg side
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run 139kph, back of a length on middle, sends Bailey back into his crease and keeps it to a single to long leg. Skidder from Umesh
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run what happened there?! Maxi had pulled his eyes off the ball, plonked his bat up like a periscope and it leaps off the face, wide of slip and gives him a single
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run short ball again and Bailey pulls to long leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run fullish delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 wide banged in short, but it wanders a bit too far down leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run fuller delivery on off stump, defended
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run flighted on middle, driven to long-on
Ashwin to Maxwell, 1 run shortish on middle and leg, Maxwell clips to deep square leg
Ashwin to Bailey, no run flighted outside off, Bailey defends to mid-off
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run down the track to the pitch of the flighted delivery outside off and whips it to long-on. Almost close to Ashwin's outstretched right hand
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run good length ball on middle, defended
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run dusts out the reverse sweep, but finds point
Yadav to Bailey, no run back of a good length outside off keeps Bailey honest
Yadav to Bailey, no run defends a shortish delivery on off stump
Yadav to Bailey, 1 wide that's the 10th wide of the innings. Slipping down leg as Bailey fails to connect with the leg glance
Yadav to Bailey, no run back of a length on middle, defended
Yadav to Bailey, 1 run fuller delivery outside off, Bailey was into the drive too early and forgot to move his feet too. Inside edge wide of mid-on
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run banged in outside off, Maxi ramps it up over the slip. Third man is fine enough to cut it short of the boundary
Yadav to Bailey, no run back of a length on off stump, defended. Only three runs off that over then
Ashwin to Maxwell, 1 run flighted on leg stump, Maxi attempts to make room but has to stay content with a push to long-on
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 run flighted on leg stump, pushed to long-on
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run goes back to a good length ball on leg stump and strikes Maxi on the pads as he plays a flick
Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs down the track and pummels a length ball over the straight boundary. Clean ball-striking

Ashwin to Maxwell, FOUR runs goes for the encore, but he has to settle for a four this time. Jumps down the track and clatters another good length ball into the sightscreen and away goes the advantage India whisked out of nothing
Yadav to Haddin, no run back of a length and outside off, gets a bottom edge behind the wicket
Yadav to Haddin, 1 run fuller delivery on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
Yadav to Maxwell, no run fuller delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
Yadav to Maxwell, no run top-class yorker from Umesh as this one reverses back in at Maxi! Only barely managed to protect middle stump and nearly topples off his feet
Yadav to Maxwell, no run back of a length and zips in at Maxi off the deck, forces him to pull his bottom hand off as he nudges it into the leg side
Yadav to Maxwell, no run full and spearing in on leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
Axar Patel to Haddin, no run pitched up on off stump, driven back at the bowler
Axar Patel to Haddin, 1 run chopped through the covers as he drags his length short and gives some room
Axar Patel to Maxwell, no run fuller delivery on middle, eased into the covers and the Indian contingent at MCG roars
Axar Patel to Maxwell, 2 runs spears in on leg stump and it's a full toss, Maxi works it to deep midwicket
Axar Patel to Maxwell, 2 runs lifts him over extra cover, and it just about lobs Rohit who was chasing after it. Maxi moved leg side to make more of a good length ball than it merited
Axar Patel to Maxwell, 1 run uses his wrists to try and flick a flatter delivery to long-on, Akshar throws himself to his right and parries it to midwicket
Shami to Maxwell, no run preempted that! Lovely change up from Shami as he slides a slower ball wide outside off to beat Maxi's desire to run down the track while making room for himself
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, no run back of a length and outside off, not enough room for Maxi to exploit with the punch through point
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run back of a length and outside off, tapped to point
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run good length ball on off stump, defended and India's fans are buzzing at the ground. Chanting, roaring, clapping
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run good length ball on off stump, eased to point and that's a wicket maiden! Phew, can I borrow someone's nails? Mine are done
Axar Patel to Haddin, no run back of a length on off stump, Haddin pushes it back to the right of the bowler and Akshar darts across

Axar Patel to Haddin, 3 runs dired in on middle, Haddin moves outside off and drills it through the covers. That region doesn't have the best cover and Rohit pulls in a big dive to flick the ball back. Very well done
Axar Patel to Faulkner, 1 leg bye full and fired in on leg stump, Faulkner is struck on the pads and weathers a huge lbw appeal. Would be sliding down leg
Axar Patel to Haddin, 1 run good length ball on middle and leg, pushed to extra cover

Axar Patel to Faulkner, no run shake of the head as Dhoni and Akshar and a few thousand India fans appeal in unison. Good length ball meets the sweep, beats it and struck under the knee roll. But perhaps it did not straighten from the angle enough. Umpire's call on clipping leg stump
Axar Patel to Faulkner, no run stays back and chops a flat, length ball into the covers
Bhuvneshwar to Haddin, 1 run terrific bowling, but they nab a single into the leg side. Cramps Haddin up with a fuller ball on middle, which was blocked

Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, FOUR runs clattered to the long leg boundary. That's a sweep to a length ball from a medium pacer, and he took the ball right on top of the bounce too. Didn't hurt his timing one bit

Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run down the track and slices a full toss into the covers, Faulkner runs with the shot and leaves Haddin in the lurch. Dhawan takes aim and misses the stumps, with Haddin nowhere in the frame
Bhuvneshwar to Haddin, 1 wide slower, short and slid down the leg side, Haddin misses with the pull and gets a wide
Bhuvneshwar to Haddin, FOUR runs almost a yorker on middle, yet Haddin clears that front leg and creams it through extra cover. One of the shots of the day, especially in such tense circumstances!
Bhuvneshwar to Haddin, 1 run gets a hand to the front-foot belt against a length ball and long-on tidies up

Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, FOUR runs full toss down leg, the Faulkner sweep dusts the game off! He does it time and time again, walks in with a few balls left and a tight game in the balance and swerves it Australia's way

10.12 pm India were wayward to start, all of their bowlers got a bit too friendly with the leg stump. But 50 overs is a long time and they regained their disciplines in the death overs. But Aaron Finch had set the chase up with a controlled 96, there were three successive fifty partnerships at the top of the order to help the lower order keep their heads. So, another first-innings hundred ends i

"The ball's coming out wlel and Australia's winning games. Great to contribute and it was a team effort. Picked up key wickets.Rohit batted well, but Finchy played well and Faulkner's finished it for us. I was a bit nervous, still am standing with pads on talking to you" says Mitchell Starc, the Man of the Match for the second match in a row

"A lot depends on conditions, about how the wicket is behaving, specially with drop-in wickets. Also the dew factor, today there wasn't any. But if it was it becomes difficult to contain and then the composition of the attack. On the higher end of 270, should be defended because the bowlers will get extra bounce and will reverse. All three teams are top sides and it's important for the top order

"Good game over all," says MS Dhoni. Mitch bowled really well, Rohit played brilliantly. But what was crucial was bowling with the new ball. The game was just drifting till the 30th over, but we picked up at 35 overs and once we got reverse swing we were able to put pressure. I said I don't care about the result, just keep in mind what happened after the last huddle. That will win us tournaments

That's our coverage for the game, thanks for your company and your comments. Join us as the tournament moves on to Brisbane when India take on England on Tuesday. Till then, this is Alagappan Muthu saying sayonara
Australia won by 4 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Mitchell Starc, AUS
